categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: An Initiate enrolled in the Coruscant Jedi Temple's academy during the final decade of the Galactic Republic.

This individual was identified as Force-sensitive and given over to the Jedi Order for training in the ways of the Force. Assigned to an Initiate Clan, they were cautious, calm and followed orders. They were close friends with another youngling.

When the Clone Wars erupted between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the youngling and a group of fellow students, including Ammon, Cryle, Tryla, a  Human Youngling and an Insectoid Youngling, accompanied Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker on a training mission to a jungle planet.
